messages.subject: Re: grandparents don't understand unschooling
messages.msgSnippet: It is easy to turn what the kids choose to do from being passionate into educationese later, when and if they choose to move on to college.   Shelley  i
messages.messageBody:
It is easy to turn what the kids choose to do from being passionate into educationese later, when and if they choose to move on to college.
 
Shelley  i agree 10000000000000 % ! i kept a journal in the beginning and then transferred that to memos on my computer. some people blog to have a record of what they did.. lots of ways to keep track! photo journal.... sometimes the kids want to do this for you! LOL

 

 Fondly, Denise
my ministry website:
http://dmm5692.tripod.com/

I would like to live my life in such a way that when my feet hit the floor in the morning, Satan grumbles and says, "Damn! She's awake."

----











God provides! God Provides ! GOD PROVIDES!!!!!!!  Denise
